gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Grizzlies 120, Mavericks 103
gameRecap.excerpt: The Grizzlies defeat the Mavericks, 120-103.  Desmond Bane led the way with 32 points, nine rebounds and four assists for the Grizzlies, while Marcus Smart added 23 points, four rebounds and four 3PM in the victory.  Kyrie Irving (33 points, eight rebounds, four assists, four steals) and Luka Doncic (31 points, six rebounds, six assists) combine for 64 for the Mavericks in the losing effort.  The Grizzlies improve to 14-23 on the season, while the Mavericks fall to 22-16.
